```{r label = "setup"}
library(spinglass)
```

# Provided Data Set(s)

```{r label = "provided-data-sets"}
data(package = "spinglass")$results[, c("Item", "Title")]
str(SBM_net)
```
The `SBM_net` object is the result of calling `matrix_to_df`.
```{r}
net <- matrix_to_df(func_mat = SBM_net$func_mat, str_mat = SBM_net$str_mat)
identical(net, SBM_net)
```

# HMS Workflow

```{r}
hms_object <-
  hms(
      input_net = SBM_net
      , spins = 4
      , alpha = 0
      , coolfact = 0.99
      , false_pos = 0.01
      , max_layers = 1)
str(hms_object)
```
